1{-# LANGUAGE FlexibleInstances #-}
2{-# OPTIONS_GHC -Wall #-}
3
4-- | Convert to 'B.Doc' pretty printer.
5
6module Koshucode.Baala.Base.Text.PPrint
7  ( PPrint (..),
8    pprintH, pprintV,
9    pprintWraps,
10  ) where
11
12import qualified Text.PrettyPrint                 as Pr
13import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Base.Prelude     as B
14import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Base.List        as B
15
16-- | Convert to 'B.Doc' pretty printer.
17class PPrint a where
18    pprint :: a -> B.Doc
19
20-- | No conversion.
21instance PPrint B.Doc where
22    pprint = id
23
24-- | 'Int' printer, same as 'Pr.int'.
25instance PPrint Int where
26    pprint = Pr.int
27
28-- | 'Integer' printer, same as 'Pr.integer'.
29instance PPrint Integer where
30    pprint = Pr.integer
31
32-- | 'String' printer, same as 'Pr.text'.
33instance PPrint String where
34    pprint = Pr.text
35
36-- | Concatenate docs horizontally with space, same as 'Pr.hsep'.
37--
38--   >>> pprintH ["abc", "def"]
39--   abc def
40
41pprintH :: (PPrint a) => [a] -> B.Doc
42pprintH = Pr.hsep . map pprint
43
44-- | Concatenate docs vertically, same as 'Pr.vcat'.
45--
46--   >>> pprintV ["abc", "def"]
47--   abc
48--   def
49
50pprintV :: (PPrint a) => [a] -> B.Doc
51pprintV = Pr.vcat . map pprint
52
53-- | Wrap doc with open and close docs.
54--
55--   >>> pprintWraps "(" ")" "abc"
56--   ( abc )
57
58pprintWraps :: (PPrint a, PPrint b) => a -> a -> b -> B.Doc
59pprintWraps = pprintWrapBody (B.<+>)
60
61pprintWrapBody :: (PPrint a, PPrint b) => B.Bin B.Doc -> a -> a -> b -> B.Doc
62pprintWrapBody p open close a = pprint open `p` pprint a `p` pprint close
63
